description:
Log health metrics such as blood pressure, weight and quite a few others
Privacy respecting logging of blood pressure, oxygen, glucose, temperature, weight, fluid intake, as well as a simple diary.
Includes ways to securely share the sensitive data with medical staff if and when required. 

 * Support for biometric(fingerprint) logon 
 * Charts with trends and thresholds 
 * CSV Data export via protected/encrypted zip files
 * Ability to share health data via PDF files inside protected/encrypted zip files
